short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KnowHow is a software tool for equipping your team with the step-by-step processes they need to do their jobs effectively

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KnowHow is the easiest way for restorers to know exactly what they’re supposed to be doing, when, and how. Your company’s virtual expert, Howie, is at your service to search through company documentation, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), equipment manuals, and more to find the answers you need when questions come up on-the-job, faster than ever, ensuring you can restore with confidence.

With KnowHow’s Official Chrome Extension, you can bring the Magic of Magic Search even closer. Wherever you are on the internet, you’re only a click away from Howie using the power of artificial intelligence to answer any questions you have.

Additionally, with KnowHow Re-View, you can create a brand new process or SOP in the time it takes you to complete a task. Just hit record, narrate what you’re doing, and once you’re done, KnowHow’s AI tool will turn your screenshare into a step-by-step repeatable process, with embedded videos all along the way.

KnowHow’s Chrome Extension makes it easier than ever to get the answers you need, and create processes for your team, without going out of your way.

With KnowHow every team member - from accountants to technicians - has step-by-step guidance based on your company’s best practices. Learn more at tryknowhow.com.
